name: moonlotto-moonbase
description: Moonbeam lottery subgraph tutorial for documentation

scripts.deploy: npx graph deploy dabit3/moonbasealpha1 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-staging: npx graph deploy PureStake/moonlotto-moonbase --ipfs https://api.staging.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.staging.thegraph.com/deploy/
scripts.deploy-local: npx graph deploy PureStake/moonlotto-dev --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
